text: Ðætte unlærede ne dyrren underfon lariowdom.
Ne eft ða gelæredan, ðe sua nyllað libban sua hie on bocum leornedon, ðæt hie sceoldon ne underfon ða are ðæs lariowdomes.
Be ðære byrðenne ðæs reccenddomes, & hu he scyle eall earfoðu forsion, & hu forht he sceal bion for ælcre orsorgnesse.
Ond hu oft sio bisgung ðæs rices & ðæs recedomes toslit ðæt mod ðæs recceres.
Bi ðæm ðe magon on ealdordome nytte bion on bisnum & on cræftum, & ðonne for hiora agenre ieðnesse ðæt fleoð.
Bi ðam ðe for eaðmodnesse fleoð ða byrðenne ðæs lariowdomes;
Ðonne hie bioð ryhtlice eaðmode ðonne hie ne winnað wið ðone godcundan dom.
Ðætte oft ðæs lariowdomes ðegnung bið suiðe untælwierðlice gewilnad, & eac suiðe untælwyrðlice monige bioð togeniedde.
Bi ðæm ðe wilnað biscephad to underfonne, hu hie gegripað ðone cuide ðæs apostoles Paules hira gitsunge to fultume.
Hu ðæt mod ðætte wilnað for oðre bion, lihð himselfum ðonne hit ðencð fela godra weorca to wyrcanne, & ðæt licet oðrum monnum, gif he woroldare hæbbe, & wile hit ðonne oferhebban siððan he hi hæfð.
Huelc se beon sceal ðe to reccenddome cuman sceal.
Huelc se beon sceal se ðærto cuman ne sceal.
Hu se se ðe gedafenlice & endebyrdlice to cymð, hu he ðæron drohtian scyle.
Hu se lareow sceal beon clæne on his mode.
Hu se lariow sceal beon on his weorcum fyrmesð.
Hu se lariow sceal beon gesceadwis on his suigean & nyttwyrðe on his wordum.
Hu se lariow sceal bion eallum monnum efnðrowiende & foreðencende on hira earfeðum.
Hu se reccere sceal bion ðæm weldoendum monnum fore eaðmodnesse gefera, & wið ðara yfelena unðeawas stræc for ryhtwislecum andan.
Hu se lariow ne sceal ða inneran gimenne gewanian for <ðære>, uterran abisgunge, ne eft ða uterran ne forlæte he for ðære innerran.
Ðætte se reccere his godan weorc fore gielpe anum ne do, ac ma for Godes lufan.
Ðætte se reccere sceal geornlice witan ðætte oft ða unðeawas leogað & licettað ðætte hi sien gode ðeawas.
Hu gesceadwis se reccere sceal bion on his ðreaunga & on his oleccunga, & eac on his hatheortnesse & on his manðwærnesse.
Hu suiðe se reccere sceal bion on his smeaunga abisgod ymb ða halgan æ.
Hu micel scyle bion ðæt toscead, & hu mislice mon scyle men læran mid ðæm cræfte ðæs lareowdomes.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne weras, on oðre wiif.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða iungan, on oðre ða ealdan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða welegan, on oðre ða wædlan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða gladan, on oðre ða unrotan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða aldormen, on oðre wisan ða hiremen.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða hlafordas, on <oðre> wisan ða ðegnas & eac ða ðeowas.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða dolan, on oðre ða wisan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða scamfæstan, on oðre ða scamleasan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ofermodan & ða upahafenan on hira mode, on oðre wisan ða earmheortan & ða wacmodan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ungeðylðegan, & on oðre ða geðyldegan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to moniane ða welwillendan, & on oðre ða æfstegan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða bilwitan, on oðre ða ðweoran & ða lytegan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða halan, on oðre ða unhalan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe him ondrædað Godes suingellan oððe monna, & for ðy forlætað ðæt hi yfel ne doð;
On oðre wisan ða ðe bioð sua aheardode on unryhtwisnesse ðæt hi mon ne mæg mid nanre ðreaunge geðreatian.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe to suiðe suige beoð, on oðre wisan ða ðe willað to fela idles & unnyttes gesprecan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe bioð to late, on oðre ða ðe bioð to hrade.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða monðwæran, on oðre ða grambæran.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða eaðmodan, on oðre wisan ða uppahæfenan on hira mode.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða anwillan, on oðre ða ungestæððegan & unfæsðrædan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe hi selfe forgiefað gifernesse, on oðre wisan ða ðe doð forhæfdnesse.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe hira agenu ðing <mildheortlice> sellað, & on oðre wisan ða ðe ðanne git wullniað oðerra monna gereafian.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe nohuæðer ne oðra monna ne wilniað, ne hira agen nyllað sellan;
On oðre wisan ða ðe willað sellan ðæt hi gestrinað & ðeah nyllað geswican ðæt hi oðre men ne reafien.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða geðwæran, on oðre ða ungeðwæran.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða wrohtgeornan, on oðre ða gesibsuman.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to moniane ða ðe ða halgan æ ryhtlice ongitan ne cunnan;
On oðre wisan ða ðe hi ryhtlice angietað & ðeah for eaðmodnesse swigiað ðæt hi hie ne bodiat.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe medomlice cunnon læran, & ðeah for miclum ege & for micelre eaðmodnesse forwandiað;
& on oðre wisan ða ðe ðanne giet to ðæm gewintrede ne beoð ne geðigene, & ðeah for hrædhydignesse beoð to gegripene.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe woroldare wilniað, & hi ðonne orsorglice habbað;
& on oðre wisan ða ðe woroldare wilniað, & ðonne hi gewilnode habbað, hi ðonne mid micelre earfoðnesse & mid micle broce onwuniað.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe beoð gebundene mid somrædenne, on oðre wisan ða ðe freo beoð ðara benda.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe gefandod habbað ðara flæsclicra synna, on oðre wisan ða ðe ðæs nowiht ne cunnan.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to moniane ða ðe ða geworhtan synna wepað, on oðre ða ðe ða geðohtan wepað.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe ðurhtogena scylda wepað, & hi suaðeah ne forlætað;
On oðre wisan ða ðe hi no ne hreowsiað, & ðeah forlætað.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe ða unaliefedan ðing ða ðe hi doð herigeað, on oðre ða ðe hi tælað & suaðeah doð.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe suiðe hrædlice beoð ofersuiðde mid sumere unryhtre gewilnunge;
On oðre wisan ða ðe longe ær ymbðeahtiað, & hit ðonne on lasð ðurhteoð.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe ofthrædlice lytla scylda wyrceað, on oðre wisan ða ðe hi gehealdað wið þa lytlan scylda, & ðeah hwiltidum afealleð on hefegum scyldum.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe nan wuht godes ne onginnað;
On oðre wisan ða ðe hit onginnað, & wel ne geendiað.
Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe deogollice yfel doð & god openlice;
On oðre wisan ða ðe willað helan ðæt hi to gode doð, & of sumum ðingum openlice kyðað ðæt hi willað ðæt men wenen ðæt hi yfele bion.
Ymbe ðæt hu man monige scyndan scyle to ðæm ðætte his godan dæda ne weorðen to yfelum dædum.
Ymbe ðæt hu mon ænne mon scyndan scile ðonne he yfle costunga monige ðrowað.
Ðætte hwilum ða leohtan scylda beoð beteran to forlætan, ðylæs ða hefegran ne weorðen ðurhtogen.
Ðætte ða untruman mod mon ne scyle eallinga to helice læran.
Be ðæm weorcum ðæs lareowes & be his wordum.
Ðonne hwa ðis eall gefylled hæbbe, hu he ðonne sceal hine selfne geðencean & ongætan, ðylæs hine auðer oððe his lif oððe his lar to upahebbe.
